title: The Sundering War
summary: A devastating war that shattered the continent into five fractured realms.
content: The Sundering War began over a dispute between the Skybound Kingdoms and the Earthen Tribes...

title: The Ember Crystals
summary: Rare, glowing stones believed to hold the power of the first dragons.
content: Ember Crystals are relics of the Dragonwake, formed in the molten veins of the world when the elder wyrms died.

title: The Hollow Pact
summary: A forbidden agreement made with beings from the Void.
content: Few dare speak of the Hollow Ones. Legends say those who make the Pact gain power but lose their identity.
